title: App's main screen: at the app's main screen displays saved tasks
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions: 1. Check that at the app's main screen displays saved tasks
steps_result: 1. At the app's main screen displays saved tasks

title: App's main screen: tasks can be completed by a check-box
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions:
1. Select a check-box from one of the tasks
2. Check, that the task was noted as completed
steps_result:
1. Check-box selected
2. The task was noted as completed

title: App's main screen (editing tasks): changes made to the title or text of the task are preserved
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions:
1. Tap on the task
2. Tap the button 'üñâ'
3. Make changes to the title of the task
4. Tap the button '‚úì'
steps_result:
1. The window for editing and removing the task is opened
2. The window for editing the title or text of the task is opened
3. Changes in the task title are displayed
4. Changes saved

title: App's main screen (removing tasks): tap by the 'Delete Task' button removes the task from the list
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions:
1. Tap on the task
2. Tap by the button 'Delete Task'
steps_result:
1. The window for editing and removing the task is opened
2. The task removes from the list

title: App's main screen (editing tasks): tap by the button '‚Üê' returns a step back without saving changes
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions:
1. Tap on the task
2. Tap the button 'üñâ'
3. Tap the button '‚Üê'
steps_result:
1. The window for editing and removing the task is opened
2. The window for editing the title or text of the task is opened
3. The window for editing the title or text of the task is opened

title: App's main screen (editing and removing tasks): tap by the button '‚Üê' returns to the app's main screen
preconditions:
1. Open mobile application 'TO-DO-MVP'
2. Several tasks are created
steps_actions:
1. Tap on the task
2. Tap the button '‚Üê'
steps_result:
1. The window for editing and removing the task is opened
2. The app's main screen is opened
